name.title: Name
name.description: The official name of the party as recorded in any official register.

trading_name.description: The name by which a party is commonly known, where different from an official name.
trading_name.title: Trading Name

translated_official_name.title: Translated Official Name
translated_official_name.description: An English representation of an official name.

source_language.title: Source Language
source_language.description: An ISO 639-1 language code. Where a translated name is given the language of the original used in the name field should be provided here.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the party or organisation.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: A 2 character ISO code or the special value ‘INTL’. The primary jurisdiction in which the organisation is based.

value.title: (Value)
value.description: The type of party or organisation.
enum: Registered company, partnership or commercial association
Registered non-profit organisation, charity or foundation

org-ids.title: ORG-Ids
org-ids.description: For legal entities, a primary identifier from a relevant identifier issuing authority.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: Any secondary organisation id that parties or organisations may have.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Name of the person to contact from that party/organisation.

email.title: Email
email.description: Email of the person to contact from that party/organisation.

organisation_id.title: By Organisation ID
organisation_id.description: Organisation ID of the controlling organisation, if applicable.

id.title: Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifiers to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by a GO Lab analyst.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the person or institution who shared information about this organisation/party.

publishing_organisation_ids.title: Publishing Organisations
publishing_organisation_ids.description: Name of the organisation that published the report, evaluation or document about this organisation/party.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of the document about this organisation/party.

publication_date.title: Publication Date
publication_date.description: Publication date of the document, report or website

accessed_date.title: Accessed Date
accessed_date.description: Accessed date of the document, report or website
